data.claim:
DESIGN PRINCIPLES - ACTIONABLE CHECKLIST:

When reviewing any design, ask:

□ BALANCE - Does the layout feel stable or tilted?
□ UNITY - Do elements feel related or chaotic?
□ CONTRAST - Is there clear visual hierarchy?
□ EMPHASIS - Is there ONE clear focal point?
□ REPETITION - Are elements consistent throughout?
□ PATTERN - Do patterns enhance or clutter?
□ RHYTHM - Is there organized visual movement?
□ MOVEMENT - Does the eye flow to key info?
□ PROPORTION - Is size hierarchy clear (primary > secondary)?
□ HARMONY - Are elements cohesive but not identical?
□ VARIETY - Is there enough tension/interest?

"Every element must have FUNCTION and PURPOSE"
"Once you understand principles, you can intentionally break them"
